title: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage. Works with iPhone/iPad; Space Gray
descriptions:
Meet the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro (16-inch) — a fast, reliable laptop that’s easy to use and gentle on the eyes.

Why you’ll like it:
- Simple to start: Open the lid, press the Touch ID button to sign in with your finger, and you’re ready to go.
- Big, bright screen: The 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display is clear and bright, so text and photos are easy to see.
- Long battery life: Up to 22 hours on a single charge, so you can use it all day without worrying.
- Clear calls and sound: A sharp 1080p camera helps you look good on video calls. The six speakers and special microphones make voices easier to hear.
- Comfortable typing: The Magic Keyboard feels good on the hands and has full-sized function keys for volume and brightness.
- Works with your iPhone and iPad: Start an email on your phone and finish it on the Mac. Copy on one device, paste on another. Take FaceTime calls and see Messages on the laptop.
- Easy charging and helpful ports: Magnetic MagSafe charger snaps into place. Plug in accessories with three Thunderbolt 4 ports, an HDMI port for TVs or monitors, an SD card slot for photos, and a headphone jack.
- Fast and future-ready: Powered by Apple’s M2 Pro or M2 Max chips for smooth, snappy performance today and for years. Free software updates help keep things secure and up to date.
- Strong and elegant: Tough all‑aluminum body in Space Gray that resists everyday wear.

Good to know:
- Comes with 16 GB memory and 512 GB fast SSD storage for photos, documents, and apps.
- Connects wirelessly with Wi‑Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3 for a strong, stable connection.
- Compatible with popular apps like Microsoft 365, Adobe, and many iPhone/iPad apps.

In short: This MacBook Pro is bright, quiet, and fast, with a long battery and simple sign‑in. It’s great for email, video calls with family, photos, movies, and more—without fuss or confusion.
